snippet: The worst drought in the United States in decades may be leveling off or even be easing slightly in some places, federal weather forecasters said Thursday in a report.
abstract: Federal weather forecasters say the worst drought in the United States in decades may be leveling off or even by easing slightly in some places; news provides little comfort to farmers and ranchers who have already begun tallying their losses.
lead_paragraph: The worst drought in the United States in decades may be leveling off or even be easing slightly in some places, federal weather forecasters said Thursday in a report.

headline.seo: Drought May Be Leveling Off or Easing, Report Says
headline.main: Signs Emerge of Slight Relief From Worst of Drought
headline.print_headline: Signs Emerge of Slight Relief From Worst of Drought
